body: dude write an essay about doujin plot right below me

I even heard of a case of a married couple having a break, promised not to have sex with others, woman does anyway get's pregnant panics then goes to quickly have sex with the husband after finding out to make him think it's his. 5-6 years later the husband starts getting sus cause the dates don't match up, seeing as it took the wife weeks to find out she was pregnant, and demands a paternity test then the cat get's out the bag but because he signed the papers when the child was born that he was the father he's legally bound to pay alimony to the kid and mother even though he's not the father and was tricked into believeing it was his.

But yeah stories like these really makes me fume, still while their imaginary it still makes me wonder with statistics showing that about 3-5% of every child born is a child born into a family where the father is someone else then the dad raising them who thinks the child is theirs. Of course this could be because of multiple reasons like the wife having cheated, the woman might have had several partners but thinks/wants the child to be a specific mans child but never does a paternity test with most often the "father" never knowing there could be other potentials dads, there are also cases of men being sterile and the woman getting an insemination behind their backs or some other reasons.

page 282 is etuzan sequal to /313045/ from what I could read the family goes on a spa trip and then meets the coworker the wife is cheating with there. Husband invites him to their room to thank him for taking "care" of his wife at work. Wife is a bit against it at first but quickly starts cheating on the husband, I think she complains at that he bragged to much about their daughter. When husband falls asleep drunk she directly starts cheating on him, then the husband murmers they should have a second child in his sleep. The coworker goes crazy with trying to impregnate her and the wife thinks this is bad and she shouldn't be doing this but her body wants it. Then it's pretty much the coworker cumming inside her over and over while the husband still drowsy goes to sleep next to them fucking. Will probably be a part 3 with her being pregnant with the coworkers child and the husband unaware that she's cheating on him all the time, or it's just strongly hinted here thats what happens.
